name: Excelsior Food Distribution
description: Each month, Family Connections hosts two food pantries for families that qualify. These programs serve over 200 households each month, providing fresh produce, pantry items, eggs, and necessities.
fullDescription: Each month, Family Connections hosts two food pantries for families that qualify. These programs serve over 200 households each month, providing fresh produce, pantry items, eggs, and necessities.
whatTheyOffer: Each month, Family Connections hosts two food pantries for families that qualify. These programs serve over 200 households each month, providing fresh produce, pantry items, eggs, and necessities.
howToGetIt: Registration will open on Fridays at 2:00 pm. Registration is done through our digital form. When: Fridays at 2:00 pm
